description:
Douki-chan and the coworker she likes are trapped in the elevator together. Can she use this opportunity to get closer to him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elevator ni Issho ni Nottara, Tojikomerarete Shimatta Kaisha no Douki
My Coworker and I Were in the Elevator Together and Then We Were Trapped Inside Together
エレベーターに一緒に乗ったら, 閉じ込められてしまった会社の同期
